title: Most preferred sources of entertainment in India in 2011
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 9 number of Responses.
Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has the highest Share of respondents and Listening to the radio (any format/device) has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Listening to the radio (any format/device).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 9 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Using the internet for social or personal interests and lowest at Response Listening to the radio (any format/device).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 9 number of Responses.
Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has the highest Share of respondents and Listening to the radio (any format/device) has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Using the internet for social or personal interests has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Listening to the radio (any format/device).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 9 number of Responses.

The maximum Share of respondents 51.0 is found at Response Using the internet for social or personal interests and the minimum is found at Listening to the radio (any format/device) where Response is 12.0.
The Share of respondents of Response Using the internet for social or personal interests is 4.25% larger than the minimum value at Listening to the radio (any format/device).

Share of respondents at Response Using the internet for social or personal interests is 51.0 , second place is Watching television (any device) at 51.0, and thirdly is Reading newspapers (either printed or online) at 46.0.
Response Using the internet for social or personal interests, and Watching television (any device) share the same value 51.0.
The Response Using the internet for social or personal interests tends to be 1.6 percent higher than average.

data.Response: Using the internet for social or personal interests
Reading books (either physical books or via an e-book reader/online)
Playing videogames (handhelds PC console mobile/cellular/smartphone online)
